name: Hrushikesh Padwal
tagline: Programmer | Movie freak | Indie Game Dev
body:
### About me
My name is Hrushikesh Padwal.
Currently , I am working at HSBC as a software engineer. I have a bachelors degree in computer science.

I enjoy watching movies and listening to original scores recursively :). 
I love programming because its a combination of creativity , precision , patience and lot more that i could possibly imagine.

### Pet Projects
**Puzzle Mania** (Unfinished prototype)
